summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 136th Place from 1st Ave. Northwest to 3rd Ave. Northwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 18029 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
